title: What is Cash on Delivery (COD)?
text: COD allows payment upon package delivery. Select COD at checkout; no advance payment needed. Delivery agent collects cash or via EasyPaisa/JazzCash. Policy: COD is available for orders under PKR 50,000; higher values require partial prepayment.

title: COD Fee Structure
text: A standard COD fee of PKR 150 applies for domestic orders. Waived for prepaid. Policy: Fees are non-refundable; included in total at checkout. International COD not supported.

title: COD Payment Verification
text: Agents verify ID and count cash on-site. Refusal to pay voids delivery; package returns to sender at their cost. Policy: Repeated COD refusals (3+ times) lead to account suspension for 30 days.

title: How to File a Damage Claim
text: For damaged goods, report within 48 hours of delivery via app or email support@tcs.com with photos, order ID, and description. Policy: Claims processed within 7 days; approved claims refund up to 100% value.

title: Refund Process for Claims
text: Approved claims refund to original payment method (or cash for COD) within 5-10 business days. Track via your account dashboard. Policy: Partial refunds for minor damages; full for total loss. No refunds for misuse.

title: Eligibility for Claims
text: Claims valid for transit damage only, not seller issues. Must accept delivery to inspect. Policy: Evidence required (photos/videos); false claims result in penalties up to PKR 5,000.

title: COD Order Cancellation
text: Cancel COD orders before shipment via website. Post-shipment cancellations incur return shipping fee. Policy: Full refund minus fees for pre-shipment cancels; no refunds post-delivery refusal.

title: Lost Package Claims
text: For lost items, file after 10 days from expected delivery. Provide tracking details. Policy: Compensation up to declared value (max PKR 100,000); insurance recommended for valuables.

title: Dispute Resolution for Claims
text: Disputes reviewed by TCS team with seller input. Final decision binding. Policy: Escalation to consumer court for unresolved issues after 14 days.
